squidpony.squidmath

Class Noise.HastyPointHash

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidmath.Noise.HastyPointHash
  • Enclosing class:
    Noise

    public static final class Noise.HastyPointHash
extends Object
    A group of similar methods for getting hashes of points based on long coordinates in 2, 3, 4, or 6 dimensions and a long for state; like Noise.PointHash but optimized for speed rather than quality. This may have some quality issues relating to repetitive patterns over long sections of noise, but these may or may not be noticeable for your applications. The technique used here is based on this paper, with credit to Andrew Kensler, Aaron Knoll and Peter Shirley.
